post.body: Wednesday-D state of ur life is nthng more thn a reflection of ur state of mind!
Thursday-Evry child is n artist.D prblm is how 2 remain an artist 1c he grows up
Tuesday-Thoughts become things... choose the good ones!
If you hate me, i love you too. It aint my fault im better than you!!
Crime doesn't pay...Does that mean my job is a crime?
If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner!
